title: Starbucks Workers Set for Another Vote to Unionize
sub_head: Vote count from Arizona cafe expected Friday as more than 100 stores are trying to organize
body:
The latest vote to unionize workers at Starbucks Corp. cafes is expected Friday, as the company has intensified efforts to win over employees who have held pro-union rallies.
The vote tally for a cafe in Mesa, Ariz., is scheduled to go forward Friday afternoon after the main U.S. labor-relations body struck down the coffee companyâ€™s request to reconsider whether it was appropriate for individual stores to vote to organize.
